pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.4: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.9: “Bahū, āvuso, saṅghassa dāyakā, bahū saṅghassa bhattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.10: Mayaṁ tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.11: Tumhe ce amhākaṁ na dassatha, atha ko carahi amhākaṁ dassati?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.13: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ datvā saṅghaṁ bhattena parivisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ, na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dinnanti, te evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.17: Yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ ayyā chabbaggiyā attano pariṇāmesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.18: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.19: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.20: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.21: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.24: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.26: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.27.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.6: sāmaṁ vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.15: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.18: “idaṁ me, bhante, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.23.1: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī attano pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.24: Pariṇate vematiko attano pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.26: Saṅghassa pariṇataṁ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.27: Cetiyassa pariṇataṁ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.28: Puggalassa pariṇataṁ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.33: kattha demāti pucchiyamāno yattha tumhākaṁ deyyadhammo paribhogaṁ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṁ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṁ cittaṁ pasīdati tattha dethāti bhaṇati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.43: “Uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, tiṁsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā.
